dcterms:description: Market-1501 contains 32,668 images of 1,501 identities captured by 6 disjoint cameras. It is split into three sets: the training set has 12,936 images of 751 identities, the query set has 3,368 images of 750 identities, and the gallery set contains 19,732 images of 750 identities.
dcterms:title: Market-1501

dcterms:creator: Z. Zheng
L. Zheng
Y. Yang
dcterms:description: DukeMTMC-reID is a subset of DukeMTMC, containing 36,411 images of 1,812 identities captured by 8 cameras. Among them, 702 identities are used for training and the rest identities are for testing.
dcterms:title: DukeMTMC-reID

dcterms:creator: L. Wei
S. Zhang
W. Gao
Q. Tian
dcterms:description: MSMT17 is the largest and most challenging dataset for person re-identification, containing 126,411 images of 4,101 identities captured in 15 camera views, with both indoor and outdoor scenarios. It includes 32,621 images of 1,041 identities for training, and the rest includes 82,621 gallery images and 11,659 query images for testing.
dcterms:title: MSMT17
